page.title: 18Newcomers
page.content: Adrienne was born and brought up in Edinburgh:-John was born in Somerset and lived in Bristol as a child. Fourteen years ago Adrienne was sent to Birch Hill Hospital as a post-gradu ate social work student to complete a placement in the Social Work Department there.Subsequently,she was offered an appointment in the hospital and, for some time worked in Littleborough while continuing to live in Prestwich (North Manchester). Eleven years ago,having decided to buy a house,they looked in the Rochdale area as it was close to Birch Hill Hospital and eventally brought their present house in Calderbrook Road. Adrienne and John were both city dwellers but enjoy living in a country area.They are very dependent on motor transport and remain outward_looking.
